args.natural_language_statement: Let A ‚àà O(n) with columns A_1,...,A_n. Deduce that {A_1,...,A_n} is an orthonormal basis of ‚Ñù^n. Translate to Lean4 (end with := by sorry).

retrieved_examples.nl: If v is a unit vector and w is orthogonal to v then {v,w} is orthonormal.
retrieved_examples.lean:
import Mathlib

theorem example {V : Type*} [InnerProductSpace ‚Ñù V] {v w : V} (hv : ‚Äñv‚Äñ = 1) (hw : ‚ü™v, w‚ü´ = 0) : Orthonormal ({v, w} : Set V) := by sorry

retrieved_examples.nl: For an orthogonal matrix A, its columns form an orthonormal basis.
retrieved_examples.lean:
import Mathlib

theorem orthogonal_matrix_columns_are_orthonormal {n : ‚Ñï} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù) (h : A·µÄ ‚¨ù A = 1) : Orthonormal (fun i => A·µÄ ? ) := by sorry

retrieved_examples.nl: Columns of unitary matrix form orthonormal basis.
retrieved_examples.lean:
import Mathlib

theorem unitary_columns {n : ‚Ñï} (U : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚ÑÇ) (h : U·¥¥ ‚¨ù U = 1) : Orthonormal fun i => U.col i := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let A ‚àà O(n) with columns A_1,...,A_n. Deduce that {A_1,...,A_n} is an orthonormal basis of ‚Ñù^n. -/
theorem orthogonal_matrix_columns_are_orthonormal {n : Type*} [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n]
  (A : Matrix n n ‚Ñù) (hA : A·µÄ ‚¨ù A = 1) : Orthonormal ‚Ñù (fun i => A.col i) := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Let A ‚àà O(n) with columns A_1,...,A_n. Deduce that {A_1,...,A_n} is an orthonormal basis of ‚Ñù^n. -/
theorem orthogonal_matrix_columns_are_orthonormal {n : ‚Ñï} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù)
  (hA : Matrix.transpose A ‚¨ù A = 1) : Orthonormal ‚Ñù (fun i => A.col i) := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Let A ‚àà O(n) with columns A_1,...,A_n. Deduce that {A_1,...,A_n} is an orthonormal basis of ‚Ñù^n. -/
theorem orthogonal_matrix_columns_are_orthonormal {n : ‚Ñï} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù)
  (hA : Matrix.transpose A * A = (1 : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù)) :
  Orthonormal ‚Ñù (fun i => A.col i) := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Let A ‚àà O(n) with columns A_1,...,A_n. Deduce that {A_1,...,A_n} is an orthonormal basis of ‚Ñù^n. -/
theorem orthogonal_matrix_columns_are_orthonormal {n : ‚Ñï} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù)

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Let A ‚àà O(n) with columns A_1,...,A_n. Deduce that {A_1,...,A_n} is an orthonormal basis of ‚Ñù^n. -/
theorem orthogonal_matrix_columns_are_orthonormal {n : ‚Ñï} (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ‚Ñù)
  (hA : Matrix.transpose A * A = 1) :
  Orthonormal ‚Ñù (fun i => (EuclideanSpace.toFun (EuclideanSpace ‚Ñù (Fin n)) (A.col i))) := by sorry
